plugin.name: Vanilla
plugin.description: Select if you're not using any sorting mods and not using Horizon. Menu categories are restricted. I strongly recommend to use wheel menu with sorting mod. Left pane contains: Chems Food Drinks Devices. Right pane contains: All throwables Melee weapons Ranged weapons

plugin.name: Horizon
plugin.description: Select if you're using Horizon overhaul. Left pane contains: Healing items Cure/Radiation healing items Chems Food/Drinks/Water Alcohol Non-combat tools Right pane contains: Grenades Mines Various flares/signals/mini bots Combat tools/utilities (such as turrets, call dogs, etc...)
